title: The Lack Of Digital Tech Talent Is An 'Existential Threat' To Business Growth And Innovation - Forbes
content: The Lack Of Digital Tech Talent Is An 'Existential Threat' To Business Growth And Innovation  Forbes
description: The glaring disconnect between the insatiable demand for experienced talent and the lack of sufficiently equipped people to take on these roles impedes companiesâ€™ ability to innovate, grow and scale.
